sections.heading: carcass or filthy substance into well, spring, brook, or stream; penalty
sections.text: Whoever shall put any dead animal, carcass or part thereof, or other filthy substance, into any well, or into any spring, brook or branch of running water, of which use is made for domestic purposes, shall be guilty of a Class

28-1304.Putting carcass or filthy substance into well, spring, brook, or stream; penalty.

Whoever shall put any dead animal, carcass or part thereof, or other filthy substance, into any well, or into any spring, brook or branch of running water, of which use is made for domestic purposes, shall be guilty of a Class IV misdemeanor.

SourceLaws 1977, LB 38, ยง 288.
